1.title: Dear Diary
1.plot: Veronica, beaten up and bloody, has just gone through hell, with only her audio recorder and old videos to show for it. Determined to make sure the truth about what happened at Westerberg High is out there, she goes back to the beginning, showing the very first video she made, before everything went downhill.

2.title: Back to School
2.plot: Veronica's barely a month into school, and she's already dead inside. But with the arrival of J.D., maybe she can salvage this year (and her sanity) after all.

3.title: The Best Friend Tag
3.plot: Veronica makes up for blowing off her best friend Martha for the Heathers, and bonds with her new "gal pal," the mysterious Jane "J.D." Dean.

4.title: What Would You Do?
4.plot: Veronica takes the "lunchtime poll", asking the various students of Westerberg what they'd do in certain situations. The answers are - varied.

5.title: Veronica Is Dead
5.plot: The Heathers have stumbled across Veronica's videos, and they don't like what they see. Will Veronica's reputation survive their revenge scheme?

6.title: Better Off Dead
6.plot: Veronica has gained a girlfriend, control over her YouTube account, and a nervous breakdown. She's also lost a best friend, and a worst enemy.

7.title: Two Different Measurements
7.plot: Following her death, Heather Chandler's more popular than ever, much to Veronica's frustration. But now, Veronica has something else to worry about. Specifically, a very drunk, very horny jock.

8.title: The Girlfriend Tag
8.plot: Veronica takes on "the girlfriend tag" challenge with J.D., however they are interrupted by an anonymous calling spreading a nasty rumor. Fed up, J.D. decides enough is enough. Time to hunt some jocks.

9.title: Oops!
9.plot: Veronica, overwhelmed by J.D.'s going off the deep end, vents to her camera, while J.D. cooks up her next scheme.

10.title: Q&A
10.plot: Through the drama of it all, Veronica Sawyers takes the time to have a heart-to-heart with Heather M..

11.title: Drunken Stupor
11.plot: Veronica is heartbroken after she's forced to break her ex-best friend's heart in order to protect her and JD's secret. Whilst in this state, Heather Duke presents her with an interesting challenge which helps Veronica cope with what she's done. But Heather may have an ulterior motive for her sudden idea.

12.title: We, the Students of Westerburg High: Part 1
12.plot: Westerburg high has been shaken up by a new catastrophe, however this time, the response from the community is very... negative. Veronica appalled by this reactions and her own actions that led to this takes on drastic measures to ensure the Westerburg High fatalities end. Her scheme, however, is interrupted by an unexpected guest.

13.title: We, the Students of Westerburg High: Part 2
13.plot: JD has reached her breaking point. She has devised her ultimate grand scheme for Westerburg High and plans to put it in action. In order to stop her, Veronica has to pay the ultimate sacrifice, but with the stakes upped so high, things may not be what they seem.

14.title: How Very
14.plot: Veronica's story comes full circle as she reminisces on her senior year at Westerburg High.

locations: Boulder, Colorado, USA::(Veronica's room & Ram's room)
imdb.plot outline: Veronica Sawyer is a high school senior who just wants one thing: to get through her last year of high school in one piece. Recording everything that happens to her and posting it on YouTube, she plans to fly under the radar as always. The Heathers, however, have other plans. The Heathers rule the school with a perfectly manicured fist, and Veronica finds herself swept up in their world of gossip, backstabbing, and cruel pranks directed at the lower caste of students - including Martha, Veronica's best friend. Veronica is deeply unhappy, but endures it for the sake of her social status. That is where Jane Dean comes in. Jane, or "J.D.", and Veronica fall for each other quickly, and J.D. promises Veronica that they can make the Heathers pay. But when the bodies start piling up, Veronica realizes she may have gotten in a bit over her head...
imdb.title: The Veronica Exclusive
plot: Based on the 80's black comedy, Heathers (1988), and it's musical adaptation, Heathers: The Musical (2014), _The Veronica Exclusive_ (qv) is a modern twist on the old cult teen film.

Veronica Sawyer is a high school senior who just wants one thing: to get through her last year of high school in one piece. Recording everything that happens to her and posting it on YouTube, she plans to fly under the radar as always. The Heathers, however, have other plans. The Heathers rule the school with a perfectly manicured fist, and Veronica finds herself swept up in their world of gossip, backstabbing, and cruel pranks directed at the lower caste of students - including Martha, Veronica's best friend. Veronica is deeply unhappy, but endures it for the sake of her social status. That is where Jane Dean comes in. Jane, or "J.D.", and Veronica fall for each other quickly, and J.D. promises Veronica that they can make the Heathers pay. But when the bodies start piling up, Veronica realizes she may have gotten in a bit over her head...::Susan Mesler-Evans

Veronica Sawyer: Your classic, angst-ridden teen. She has spent the past three years of high school flying under the radar, invisible. She isn't unhappy with this, however, as she finds an outlet through vlogging her life on YouTube. Senior year, however, takes a turn for the beautiful when she somehow finds herself swept into the clutches of the Heathers. The Heathers, Westerburg High School's most powerful clique, rule the school with an iron manicure. They tear Veronica from the world of AP homework and movie nights and into the world of shopping and parties. Veronica, though at first in love with this beautiful new world she's been thrown into, eventually realizes that the love she feels when she's around the Heathers is only skin deep. She realizes that, in reality, the Heathers aren't the nicest of people and that at every turn she's surrounded by lies and backstabbing. Everyday is a war that she is tired of fighting. Eventually Veronica finds a haven from this high school hell in new girl Jane Dean. Jane Dean: Rebellious, dark, and clever. Veronica and Jane warm up to each other quickly, and together they fend their way through senior year. That is, however, until the Heathers come across Veronica's YouTube channel. The Heathers destroy Veronica for the world to see, leaving her and her channel a mockery. In an act of pure stupidity between Heather Chandler, Jane Dean, and Veronica, things take a turn for the deadly, leaving Veronica to wonder what she's gotten herself into...
